item.vstuff.lead_constraint_item.tooltip: Creates rope constraints between ships and world.
item.vstuff.lead_break_item.tooltip: Look at a rope and right-click to cut it.
item.vstuff.phys_grabber.tooltip: A method of dragging ships around!.
vstuff.expendable_assembler.tooltip.summ: A _single use_ method of assembling ships! Who knows how this thing works... Very _fragile!_
item.vstuff.rope_thrower.tooltip: Creates a _rope_ between a block and the block the projectile hits.
vstuff.pulley_anchor.tooltip: Use this as a second pos for pulley connections!
vstuff.pulley_anchor.tooltip.summary: Acts as an _anchor point_ for _pulley_ rope connections
vstuff.gui.rope_menu.title: Rope Styles
vstuff.message.nonfullblock_fail: §cCannot create rope connected to a non-full block!
vstuff.message.pulley_body_fail: §cPulley and anchor cannot be on the same ship/world pos is invalid!
vstuff.message.pulley_fail: §cYou must attach the rope to a Pulley Anchor!
vstuff.message.anchor_first_fail: §cYou must select a Phys Pulley first!
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.text_3: First, shift-right-click the pulley to start defining the rope's path.
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.text_4: Then, right-click another block to set the rope's anchor point and length.
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.text_5: The rope is now attached, and the pulley is ready to operate!
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.title: The Phys Pulley
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.text_1: Right click your first position with the rope, as normal
vstuff.ponder.phys_pulley.text_2: Right click an Anchor (as the second position) to connect the Rope
vstuff.ponder.mechanical_thruster.text_3: ...it produces a bit of thrust! (massive news)
vstuff.lead_constraint_item.tooltip.summ: A rope for VS2 ships! Press the _Open Rope Styler_ key (default _ALT_) to change the rope texture.
vstuff.lead_constraint_item.tooltip.cond: When Used on two different blocks
When Used on any block while Sneaking
vstuff.rope_thrower.tooltip.summary: A _Throwable_ rope! Press the _Open Rope Styler_ key (default _ALT_) to change the rope texture.
vstuff.rope_thrower.tooltip.condition1: Right-click the first block as normal
vstuff.rope_thrower.tooltip.behavior1: Creates a rope between the first block and the block the projectile hits when thrown.
vstuff.lead_break_item.tooltip.summary: _Cuts the rope_ you are looking at.
